dict.string: Can we use your location at all times?
Can we use your location when your app is being used?

We require access to your camera to allow you to capture photos for your profile or share them with customers within the app. For example, you can take a picture to upload as your profile image or take pictures of the problem after fixed to include it in the customer's invoice template

We require access to your gallery to allow you to use photos for your profile or share them with customers within the app. For example, you can use a picture to upload as your profile image or use pictures of the problem after fixed to include it in the customer's invoice template.

We require access to your gallery to allow you to use photos for your profile or share them with customers within the app. For example, you can use a picture to upload as your profile image or use pictures of the problem after fixed to include it in the customer's invoice template.
